resources.string: 다른 사람들에게 Resurrection Rom을 쓰는걸 알려주세요
확장된 상태표시줄 영역에 헤드업 버튼 액션을 사용/사용중지
Close the color picker without applying the new color, (cancel).\nThis has the same effect as clicking the back button on the navigation bar.
The color preview is always visible.\nIf the new color doesn\'t equals the old color, the color preview will be expanded, to allow apply the new color.
Resets the new color to the default Android or RR color without applying the new color.

Shows the hex input field.
Hex values have to be in hex color format:
'#aarrggbb', ('alpha' (transparency), 'red', 'green' and 'blue').
The back button closes the hex input field without setting the hex value.
The apply button sets the hex value as new color without applying the new color.
Shows/hides the favorites.\nHiding the favorites will not reset the favorite colors.
Pick a color to set a new color without applying the new color.\nThe color range can be changed using the slider on the right side

Favorites are empty by default.\nThe new color can be saved as a favorite at any time via long click, (a none empty favorite will be overwritten by the new color).\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
All palette colors have a fixed value.\nA click sets the favorite color as new color, without applying the new color.
알림 패널notification panel 헤더 이미지를 사용하도록 설정
밝은 이미지의 더 나은 가시성을 위해
최근 앱 뷰의 커스텀 스타일링 활성화/비활성화
모두 삭제 버튼 클릭 시 진동
모두 무시하기 버튼에 대한 촉각 피드백 활성화/비활성화
존재할 경우 길게 누르기는 메모리 바를 업데이트 합니다.
최근 항목 전체화면으로 보기가 활성화 되어 있습니다.
최근 항목 전체화면으로 보기가 비활성화 되어 있습니다.
상태 표시줄에 오른쪽을 아래로 내려 빠른 설정 열기
상태 바를 끌어 내릴 때 항상 빠른 설정 패널 보기
빠른 설정 패널에서 밝기 슬라이더 활성화/비활성화
최근 앱 보기에서 최근 앱 보기 버튼을 활성화 / 비활성화 합니다. 이 버튼을 길게 누를시 최근 작업을 모두 삭제합니다.
커스텀 시계의 색상을 변경함 / 변경하지 않음
락 스크린을 두번 탭 할 시 디바이스를 슬립모드로 전환합니다.
WARNING\u003A this disables a security check to prevent tapjacking! Use only if you understand the consequences.
현재 알림이 %1$s 개 이상일 때 락 스크린을 핀/패턴/비밀번호 입력 창으로 바로 엽니다.
잠금 화면에서 보여지는 최대 알림 갯수 조정 활성화
락스크린 뒤로 보이는 배경의 흐림 효과를 설정합니다.
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Adjust the background transparency of Qs Panel
Blur the background of recents apps
Blur personlizations are disabled during Keyguard view! Please Turn off Panel Transperancy to get best Results. Panel Transparency will not work with blur options
Note: Most apps need to be restarted for custom values to take effect
Reset all animation settings to default?
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
%s를 로드할 수 없습니다. 저장소가 존재하는지 확인 해 주세요.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
아무런 활동이 없을때 트래픽 모니터 숨기기
스크롤 캐시는 메모리를 사용하면서 스크롤 성능을 향상시킬 수도 있습니다.
기본 최근 항목 대신 OmniSwitch 사용하기
OmniSwitch를 활성화 했는지 확인해 주세요. 아래에 있는 \"설정\" 에서 할수 있습니다.
네이게이션 바를 두번 탭하여 화면 끄기
비활성 중 일 때 버튼 어둡게 표시
지정된 시간 만큼 네비게이션바 작동이 없을시 버튼 연하게 표시
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before dimming buttons
Alpha value to dim buttons to
Duration (in milliseconds) of the alpha animation
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
배터리 바 위치 및 색상 설정
충전 중 애니메이션 활성화는 사용자 경험을 저하시킬 가능성이 있습니다. 신중히 결정하시길 바랍니다.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
모든 항목을 기본 값으로 재설정 하시겠습니까?
일부 국가에서는 카메라 촬영음을 끄는 것이 불법입니다. 거주중인 국가의 관련 법률을 확인해주세요.
시계 홈 위젯이 어떻게 표시될지 보거나 바꿉니다.
\'cLock\' 홈 위젯의 시계가 어떻게 보일지 보거나 변경하기
\'cLock\' 홈 위젯의 날씨가 어떻게 보일지 보거나 변경하기
\'cLock\' 홈 위젯의 캘린더가 어떻게 보일지 보거나 변경하기
이 옵션은 보안 잠금 화면에서만 전원 메뉴를 비활성화 합니다.
비활성화됨\n이 기능을 사용하시려면 항목을 추가해 주세요
선택한 애플리케이션은 올바른 아이콘을 반환하지 않았거나 이미지 자르기를 지원하지 않습니다. 다른 애플리케이션을 사용합니다.
선택한 작업을 두 번 추가할 수 없습니다.
, 아이콘을 선택중일 때 설정 옵션을 불러옵니다

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
락스크린에서 바로가기를 사용자가 원하는 설정으로 변경
슬립 모드 중 일때 초저전력 모드로 진입할 수 있도록 허락합니다.
세션이 활성화 됐을때 슈퍼유저 표시기를 보입니다.
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active.Only For CM inbuilt Root
Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
날씨 상태를 표시 하기 위한 아이콘을 선택
락스크린상에 표시할 수 있는 알림의 한도에 도달했을때 날씨 패널을 숨기도록 합니다.
표시되는 알림의 수가 지정한 수 이상일 때 날씨 패널을 숨기도록 합니다.
새 라벨을 입력하세요. 아무것도 입력하지 않을 시 기본 설정으로 돌아갑니다.
왼쪽과 오른쪽 중 로고를 표시할 위치를 선택해주세요.
Colorize various icons in statusbar. Override theme colors
Customize carrier label text in statusbar
Customize Network Traffic Indicator in statusbar
스테이터스바에 표시 될 커스텀 로고/이미지를 선택하세요.
SELinux는 커널 수정 및 유저제작 툴의 집합체입니다. 모드를 변경하는 행위는 원치않은 결과를 초례할 수도 있습니다. 사용에는 위험이 따름을 기억하세요.
This will hide all force close notificaitons
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
배터리 세이버가 작동중일 때 네비게이션바와 스테이터스바 색상을 오렌지색으로 변경합니다.
배터리 세이버가 활성화 될 때 노티피케이션바에 표시합니다.
배터리 수준이 낮을 때 알림을 표시
스테이터스바에 기온이 표시 될 위치를 선택하세요.
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show power menu on the lock screen
Show Charging Current rate on lock screen
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Customize PA Pie 2.0 targets, style, size and color
Whether or not the menu button should always be shown, even when its not needed
Select the location where the Pie will be placed
Adjust the gap that separates the Pie elements
Adjust the angle of pie\'s egdes from the attachment
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Enable expand quick settings panel button
Pie will be always shown on the right while in landscape
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area.
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Doze pulse will be triggered by pick up gesture sensor events
Pick up gesture sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by significant motion sensor events
Significant motion sensor will not be utilized as a triggering mechanism
Doze pulse will be triggered by notifications
Notifications will not be utilized as a trigger
Predefined doze repeat intervals (normally [1s,10s,30s,60s,120s]) will be used (default)
Doze will only pulse once per notification
Brightness level of doze pulse screen (% of max allowed brightness)
Ambient display notifications will not be inverted. Use for dark themes.
Ambient display notifications will show as inverted. Use for light/stock theme.
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Set custom animations for system keyboard
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Battery history stats are going to be reset
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Enable Disable The Brightness Icon Existing Next To Brightness Slider
Enable/Disable This Switch make Add Tiles Icon Visible even With Brightness Slider Disabled
Disables quick settings in the keyguard for a secure lock only
Vibrate Icons In Header On SinglePress
Vibrate Icons In Header On LongPress
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
If the icon is an greyscale icon
If the notification doesn\`t include an own color
Longpress power button while screen is off to turn on flashlight
Change the view of the recents screen
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Change the number of columns displayed in the dashboard
Show dashboard tile titles in 2 lines
Change the position of the dashboard switches
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your SMS notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Show / Hide Clock In Header In Header
Show / Hide Date In Header In Header
Show / Hide AM / PM Values In Header
Show / Hide Battery Percentange While Charging In Header
Show / Hide System Icons Like Battery In Header
Show / Hide Users Switch Icon In Header
Show / Hide Settings Icon In Header
Show / Hide Next Alarm In Header
For better visibility on themed headers
Reset Header Color Back to Default
Enable for icons to rotate when screen is rotated or navbar recreated.
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Customize Border of Quick Settings Panel.Use at your own risk .Might not be compatible with some themes.
Customize Border of Header.Use at your own risk .Might not be compatible with some themes.
Colorize various Elements on Qs Panel. NOTE: Settings icon colors might disable qs icon animation. Use at your own risk
Enable to use a center color for the gradient
Use a center color on Header
Enable to use a center color for the gradient on Header
from bottom left to top right
from bottom right to top left
from top right to bottom left
from top left to bottom right
Use Only If Colors Are Not Applied. Tap To Apply
Show Logos in Statusbar from a wide range of icons available in System
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Adjust The Dimensions of The Pulse bars in Visualizer with Custom Dimension Changer. Also Adjust The Spacing Between Them
Adjust The Size of Pulse Visualizer Blocks and Spacing Each Block
Adjust The Agression for Pulse Visualizer. Relaxed Being Smallest and Insane Being Most Agressive
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Number of QS tiles per row
This Can Also Be Accessed By Longpressing Settings Button in Notification Header
Two main tiles on the first row
Enable Three Location States In Qs
Swiping up on the heads up notification will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Force heads up in all applications
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel.
Whether to allow global use of float mode, if this is off none of the below options will work DUH!!!
Launch Slim & Pie Actions in Floating Window Mode
Launch Gesture Anywhere shortcuts in float mode
Colorize Various Elements of Dashboard With the Options Below.

Show a notification when the battery is fully charged
Show Dark icons on statusbar with light backgrounds.This removes the gradient view on it but also introduces other issues like clock color. Use at your own Risk
Change the enter/exit animation of the panel change
Always display a notification when debugging is enabled, even if not connected
Tapping data tile will enable /disable mobile data
Tapping data tile will open detail view
Enable Halo Button in extended statusbar. Tap on halo icon in Statusbar Header to enable halo.
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Shortcut to Floating Windows options so you can use or not use with HALO
Always launch activities from notifications in Float Mode.
Let this app show notifications in HALO
